# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 117.5, -30.5), boiler(position 111.5, -32.0), offshore pump(position 106.5, -32.5), and small-electric-pole(position 111.5, -30.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -79.5) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)

### Offshore pump system at position(116.5, -54.5)
Consists of multiple offshore pumps at positions (116.5, -54.5), (115.5, -51.5), (116.5, -53.5), (116.5, -49.5), (116.5, -47.5), (116.5, -45.5), (115.5, -43.5), (115.5, -41.5), (116.5, -40.5), (118.5, -40.5), (120.5, -40.5), (122.5, -39.5), (124.5, -39.5), (126.5, -37.5), (128.5, -35.5), and (130.5, -33.5)

### Pipe system at position(105.5, -32.5)
Consists of multiple pipes at positions (105.5, -32.5), (105.5, -31.5), (106.5, -31.5), (107.5, -30.5), (108.5, -30.5), and (109.5, -30.5)

### Belt system at position(39.5, -83.5)
Consists of multiple belts at positions (39.5, -83.5), (38.5, -79.5), (63.5, -53.5), and (64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when accessing entity attributes
-  Make sure to access entity attributes correctly, e.g., `offshore_pump.position.x` instead of `offshore_pump.position.position.x`
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities are correctly positioned and connected before attempting to connect them
### Errors when using float values as integers
-  Make sure to convert float values to integers before using them as integers, e.g., `round(offshore_pump.position.x)` instead of `offshore_pump.position.x`

# NAMESPACE
### Utility functions
- `connect_entities`: connects two entities
- `get_entity_position`: gets the position of an entity
### Important variables
- `offshore_pump`: an offshore pump entity
- `boiler`: a boiler entity
- `steam_engine`: a steam engine entity
- `small_electric_pole`: a small electric pole entity
- `burner_mining_drill`: a burner mining drill entity
- `furnace`: a furnace entity
- `burner_inserter`: a burner inserter entity
- `belt`: a belt entity
- `pipe`: a pipe entity
- `position`: a position object
- `entity`: an entity object
